name: Roodenburg House

reviews.text: I had an excellent stay at this guesthouse. Luxurious comfortable rooms, great staff, delicious breakfast and very conveniently located. One of the best places I have stayed at. I would definitely recommend it.
reviews.title: Wonderful guesthouse and great location

reviews.text: This guesthouse is wonderful! I stayed here for one week and loved every minute of it. The staff is extremely helpful. Although I was here for work, staying here made it almost seem like a holiday. The rooms are wonderful, big and luxurious! Conveniently located close to shops and not far from the main highway (the N2), the location couldn't have been better. The property is well maintained and extremely clean. Working out by the pool was a delight. I will definitely stay here again! Thank you David (the manager) and Bev and Phillip are great!
reviews.title: A wonderful guesthouse and great staff!

reviews.text: I was very well looked after at a reasonable price. Service is excellent and will keep coming back!
reviews.title: Total value for money and a hearty stay!

reviews.text: I had a great stay at the Roodenburg House and was sad to leave. I chose this place as it was near the Sport Sciences Institute where I had knee surgery. David, the establishment's manager, and his extremely friendly and accommodating team, did everything possible to make my post-op stay there easy, stress-free and super comfortable.
reviews.title: A Really Special Place

reviews.text: The guesthouse is a very nicely appointed and well maintained large house. I stayed in the downstairs suite, which is quite roomy, fully furnished with elegant but inviting chairs, a nice desk, armoire, a large very comfortable bed, and colorful, tasteful drapery. There is also a good quality flat screen television with a DVD player, free hi-speed internet, a fireplace, and the room opens to a small private garden patio. The bathroom is large and matches the room in being luxuriously outfitted.
reviews.title: Roodenburg House: A special place that calls you back for a return visit

reviews.text: The decoration is very nice and the place is quiet in a very nice environment (in particular you will enjoy a nice view of the table mountain)
reviews.title: Lovely place to stay

reviews.text: Service is excellent and the staff is very kind.

reviews.text: Last but not least, breakfast is very good.
reviews.title: Roodenburg House- Excellent!

reviews.text: You can go !
reviews.title: Great Guesthouse!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have traveled to Cape Town several times over the last few years and have stayed in a couple different B&B's. The Roodenburg House was by far the best experience! It's so conveniently located and has great amenities, but the personal attention given by David and his staff was extraordinary! One night we grabbed some carry-out from a nearby Thai restaurant and brought it back to the Roodenburg House. The staff brought out plates and silverware for us at a time when they were off-duty. Just one of the many ways they made us feel welcome during our stay. I would highly recommend the Roodenburg House to anyone who is traveling to Cape Town for business or pleasure.
reviews.title: What a lovely place

reviews.text: I recently had the good fortune to stay in the most delightful guest house in Cape Town. The rooms were luxurious, very clean and extremely comfortable. They cater to your every need and add their personal touch to make you feel at home. The staff are so friendly and are always available to help,no matter what your request.The manager, David goes out of his way to arrange tours, massages,shopping for special items and anything else you may require.
reviews.title: Roodenburg House

reviews.text: I would not hesitate to recommend Roodenburg House and cannot wait to return.
reviews.title: Truly a perfect choice!

reviews.text: Firstly the location is very central, easy access to downtown, Muizenburg and airport. Felt very safe during my daily walks in the neighbourhood. I was there for 3 weeks and cannot say enough about the excellence of every aspect of Roodenburg. Room was fabulous, staff are more obliging than I have come across in any 5 star hotel, breakfast was amazing & actually they will arrange to have whatever one wants. The living room area is so warm and inviting, it is quiet and so comfortable but the TV is available at all times if you want to watch & there is also TV in the rooms. The pool area is charming with a gorgeous view of the mountain and a feeling of serenity.
reviews.title: perfect stay just outside capetown

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The house itself is very tastefully decorated but at the same time it has a sense of warmth and welcome that I truly felt & loved. I will be back there next year because of the welcome and excellent service as well as the privacy & comfort. I will definitely recommend Roodenburg to any and evryone who is visiting Cape Town. Thanks to David and his amazing staff for being such a huge part of the success of my holiday!
reviews.title: Great place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: relaxed and still close to the city, we really enjoyed our stay here. rooms were comfy, hosts were very friendly. They even prepared breakfast(in our frigde) when we needed to leave the b&b at 5am for our flight back.
reviews.title: A gorgeous home to unwind & relax,

reviews.text: After staying at the Roodenburg House I will have a very hard time going back to chain hotels with their generic service. Unfortunately my stay was quite short. Should I ever get to visit Cape Town again Roodenburg House will be my first choice. The service is simply outstanding!! Thanks for a great experience.
reviews.title: Wonderful guest house!

reviews.text: I was in Cape Town on business for about two weeks and stayed here the whole time. The rooms here carry nice characteristics and they are huge (compared to hotels in my city, Hong Kong). Staff here are extremely friendly and helpful. The breakfast here is pretty much the same everyday but I still enjoyed a lot. Great thanks to David! And I am sorry for this belated review.
reviews.title: Warm and sweet

reviews.text: We spent 14nights at this beautiful guest house the location was excellent and very convenient to all he wonderful sights that Cape Town has to offer. David and his staff especially Philip really looked after us and nothing was ever too much trouble. We would highly recommend this guest house as a place t stay and would like t thank them for making ou holiday complete and to return one day
reviews.title: What a trip Pam and Terry

reviews.title: Feeling like at home

reviews.text: We want to thank the whole staff - especially David for the hospitality they offered to us during our stay in Capetown. The hotel´s location is close to Capetown (surroundings of the city, 20 min to city centre) in a very safe area; rooms and service are excellent and the atmosphere is cosy and warm. We received many information for visiting Capetown and even at the end of our stay David helped us with recommodations for our next destinations. For us it was one of the best guesthouses during our vacation in Western Cape.
reviews.title: An amazing place

aka: Roodenburg House Cape Town, South Africa
description: This beautifully restored 1882 Arts and Crafts residence is set in the heart of leafy Rondebosch, close to sports stadia and UCT. Luxury and comfort with air-conditioned bedrooms, original art work, fireplaces, stylish bar and lounges, gym and saltwater pool set in tranquil gardens. DSTV and WiFi. Gourmet breakfasts alfresco or indoors, with home cooked dinners offered. Spa treatments arranged. Conferences for up to 20. Easy access to City and airport. TGCSA 4-Star Guest House | Secure gated parking | Children welcome
